text: Chinese spinach can mean any of several plants grown as leaf vegetables in China (among other places): *Amaranthus dubius, (), often bearing red or purple marks *Amaranthus tricolor *Capsella bursa-pastoris, "shepherd's purse", () *Ipomoea aquatica, (蕹菜; wèngcài) semi-aquatic with hollow stems and long, lance-shaped leaves. Sold as "Ong Choy" or "On Choy" in West Coast North American Chinese markets. *Malabar spinach, (落葵; luòkuí) with thick, succulent, heart-shaped leaves ==See also== *Spinach (disambiguation)
title: Chinese spinach
